schemaconfiguration.description: Used to differentiate products in different categories, eg, Hair Care, Washing and Bathing etc.
schemaconfiguration.pimFieldDescription: Product Category (Enter N/A if not applicable)

schemaconfiguration_1606851681.description: Not shown on the website. Internal flag which can be used by content authors to indicate which pieces of content need to be enhanced by a content agency.
schemaconfiguration_1606851681.pimFieldDescription: Copy type (Enter Standard if not sure)

schemaconfiguration_370863464.description: Set to Product for all product.

schemaconfiguration_1386243609.description: Set to NEW for all products.

schemaconfiguration_1501989305.description: Specify either UPC or EAN. This specifies the type of identifier contained within the IdentifierValue field and is used by the 3rd party Kritique

schemaconfiguration_2360462.description: 12 digit UPC or EAN code (see also IdentifierType field). Used by Kritique.

schemaconfiguration_910353417.description: This is the main product ID which is used as the unique identifier by AEM.

schemaconfiguration_2022300338.description: Used to identify different size variations ("children") of the same product. This allows children and parent products to be related to one another.

schemaconfiguration_648156517.description: The main product name as it will be displayed on site, including on the navigation, breadcrumb, product detail pages, etc.

schemaconfiguration_1314944728.description: Comma separated list of product pack shots, using TAB ID (not the image URL).

schemaconfiguration_2145645119.description: Comma separated list of alternate text for each image as listed in the ProductImage field, in the same order.
schemaconfiguration_2145645119.pimFieldDescription: Comma separated ALT Text for product images

schemaconfiguration_1731459576.description: Number of items contained within each pack and the size of each item (e.g. 2x50g or 250ml). The size of the product is displayed below the product description. If a product has more than one variant, then the sizes are displayed in a dropdown along with the price of the product.

schemaconfiguration_987476113.description: HTML page title for SEO purposes. This is also shown to the user in the titlebar of the browser window.

schemaconfiguration_86139267.description: This is the meta description which is added to the product page, for SEO purposes. It is not displayed directly on the site, but will show up in places like Google search results for the product pages.

schemaconfiguration_787223654.description: List of tags used to categorise the product and associate products with one another. The main site navigation is also derived from this field. This information should come from the Content Taxonomy which is usually produced by Mavern.

schemaconfiguration_1775283103.description: Alternate Product name field provided to support special characters in Product name. Incase this field is populated then in Title this value will appear instead of what has been provided in productName field

schemaconfiguration_1301288809.description: Alternate Product number field. Incase this field is populated then product node will get created based on this number instead of what has been provided in EAN field

schemaconfiguration_1234915480.description: Buy it now ID, as provided by the Buy It Now 3rd party.
schemaconfiguration_1234915480.pimFieldDescription: Smart Product Id (ID used for BIN)

schemaconfiguration_1165773722.description: Product Id generated by Label Insight for Smartlabel. This is used to create the link which will redirect users to the 3rd party.
schemaconfiguration_1165773722.pimFieldDescription: Label Insight Id (used for Smartlabel integration)

schemaconfiguration_341919459.description: This field is only used by the Item Lookup Service (ILS).
schemaconfiguration_341919459.pimFieldDescription: ILS Product name (only for US markets)

schemaconfiguration_625831486.description: This field is used to buy it now functionality.

schemaconfiguration_1263687667.description: 10 digit UPC code. This field is only used by Store Locator service in US to allow users to Buy it now

schemaconfiguration_1343635575.description: If this product is a box/multipack, then specify the EAN numbers of the products contained within the multipack

schemaconfiguration_943430302.description: Can be used by the front-end to determine the best layout to suit the broad dimensions of the pack shot (i.e. Tall for portrait shots such as a shampoo bottle, OR Short for landscape shots such as a soap bar). This allows greater flexibility when designing a Product Details Page that needs to cater for different products.

schemaconfiguration_974116481.description: Recommended Retail Price. If a product has more than one variant, then the sizes are displayed in a dropdown along with the price of the product.

schemaconfiguration_1508932179.description: Long page description for purposes of SEO meta data. Not frequently used.

schemaconfiguration_664103358.description: Short product description/overview text which typically appears prominently on the Product Details Page underneath the Product Name or hero product image. Typically this is a concise description of product key features written in sentence/paragraph form.

schemaconfiguration_372062406.description: Title text for the About this content section on the Product Details page.

schemaconfiguration_1302569863.description: List of up to 6x bullet points showing core product information. Typically an overview of

schemaconfiguration_544913504.description: Additional product information or long copy. Typically a detailed version of AboutThisProductBullets

schemaconfiguration_52086668.description: Text heading for the Perfect For section of the Product Details Page

schemaconfiguration_1192091119.description: Paragraph text for the Perfect For section of the Product Details Page

schemaconfiguration_1164472738.description: Text heading for the How to use section of the Product Details Page

schemaconfiguration_1813950373.description: Paragraph text explaining how to use the product of the Product Details Page

schemaconfiguration_533322194.description: Text heading for the Try this section of the Product Details Page

schemaconfiguration_1453366104.description: Paragraph text for the Try this section of the Product Details Page

schemaconfiguration_206162827.description: Additional text shown next to the ingredients list. Typically used to tell the consumer that ingredients are liable to change without notice.

schemaconfiguration_1848030923.description: Additional allergy text information if required

schemaconfiguration_1114727531.description: Gift wrapping information. This field appears just below the CTA Personalize this gift on PDP page, having short description about the gift.

schemaconfiguration_1160307616.description: Gift wrapping information. This field appears below the description field which have small description about the product on PDP page.

schemaconfiguration_175120787.description: Gift wrapping information. Alt text for the gift image, which appears on the Product Gifting page

schemaconfiguration_1458467937.description: Gift wrapping information. TAB ID to generate the image on Product Gifting Page

schemaconfiguration_1896982089.description: Gift wrapping information. Product price which appears on PDP page

schemaconfiguration_1273567467.description: Gift wrapping information. Wrapping price appears on Product gifting page (in Total section against Exclusive gift wrap text, just above the Add to shopping basket CTA) when user select one of the wrapping text.
